sqlMap.select:
select t1.*, t2.orgname, t3.empname from T_MODEL_TIMEDAY t1, om_organization t2, om_employee t3 where t1.orgcode = t2.orgcode and t1.empid = t3.empid
t1.time >= '$startDate$'
t1.time <= '$endDate$'
order by t1.time
select t1.* from T_MODEL_TIMEDAY t1 where t1.status = '0' and t1.time >= '$startD$' and t1.time <= '$endD$' order by t1.time
select t1.* from T_MODEL_TIMEDAY t1 where t1.time = #time:VARCHAR# and t1.id <> #id:DECIMAL:-9999#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_T_MODEL_TIMEDAY.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_MODEL_TIMEDAY(ID, TYPE, TIME, STATUS, REMARK, ORGCODE, EMPID ) values (#id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #type:VARCHAR#, trim(#time:VARCHAR#), #status:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #orgcode:VARCHAR#, #empid:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_MODEL_TIMEDAY t set t.type = #type:VARCHAR#, t.time = #time:VARCHAR#, t.remark = #remark:VARCHAR#, t.status = #status:VARCHAR#, t.orgcode = #orgcode:VARCHAR#, t.empid = #empid:VARCHAR# where t.id = #id:DECIMAL:-9999#
sqlMap.delete: delete from T_MODEL_TIMEDAY t where t.id = #id:DECIMAL:-9999#
sqlMap.select: select t1.ID, t1.TYPE, to_char( to_date(t1.TIME, 'yyyy/MM/dd') ,'yyyy-MM-dd' ) as time, t1.REMARK, t1.STATUS, t1.ORGCODE, t1.EMPID from T_MODEL_TIMEDAY t1 where t1.id = #id:DECIMAL:-9999#

select t5.execution_id as flow_id, t5.procdefid_ as definition_id, t6.process_name from (select t3.*, t4.procdefid_ from (select t2.* from (select t.*, row_number() over(partition by t.execution_id order by t.id desc) as rn from T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE t) t2 where t2.rn = 1 and t2.next_activity_name = '结束') t3, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST t4 where t3.execution_id = t4.id_) t5, T_PROCESS_CONFIG t6 where t5.procdefid_ = t6.definition_id and t6.business_type = '88' order by t5.execution_id

select t.DBID_, t.TYPE_, t.EXECUTION_, t.ACTIVITY_NAME_, to_char(t.START_, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS START_, to_char(t.END_, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS END_, t.TRANSITION_, t.HTASK_, row_number() over(partition by t.ACTIVITY_NAME_ order by t.START_ asc) as rn from JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST t where t.execution_= '$flow_id$'

select C_ID from t_model_proLoanTimeLimit where definition_id = '$definition_id$' and D_ID = (select D_ID from t_model_oneAndLoanCategory where oneCategory_name = '$oneCategory_name$' and loanCategory_name = '$loanCategory_name$')
select * from t_model_nodeTimeLimit where c_id = '$c_id$' and taskname = '$activity_name$'
select operatorname from ac_operator where operatorid = (select assignee_ from JBPM4_HIST_TASK where dbid_= '$htask$')
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_T_MODEL_OVERTIMEREPORT.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into t_model_overtimeReport (ID, REPORTTIME, TASKNAME, CUSTNAME, ONECATEGORY_NAME, LOANCATEGORY_NAME, ORGNAME, EMPNAME, OVERTIME, REMARK, REQUEST_ID, PROCESS_NAME, FLOW_ID, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TIMELIMITONE, TIMELIMITTWO, RN, EXPENDTIME, ORGNAME_ONE, ORGNAME_TWO)
values (#id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #reportTime:VARCHAR#, #taskName:VARCHAR#, #custName:VARCHAR#, #oneCategory_name:VARCHAR#, #loanCategory_name:VARCHAR#, #orgname:VARCHAR#, #empname:VARCHAR#, #overtime:DOUBLE#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #request_id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #process_name:VARCHAR#, #flow_id:VARCHAR#, #starttime:VARCHAR#, #endtime:VARCHAR#, #timeLimitOne:DOUBLE#, #timeLimitTwo:DOUBLE#, #rn:DECIMAL:-9999#, #expendtime:DOUBLE#, #orgname_one:VARCHAR#, #orgname_two:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ_T_MODEL_REQUESTID.NEXTVAL AS request_id FROM DUAL

select ID, REPORTTIME ,TASKNAME, CUSTNAME, ONECATEGORY_NAME,LOANCATEGORY_NAME, ORGNAME_ONE, ORGNAME_TWO, EMPNAME, trunc(OVERTIME, 2) as OVERTIME, REMARK, REQUEST_ID, PROCESS_NAME, to_char(to_date(STARTTIME, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') , 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as STARTTIME, to_char(to_date(ENDTIME, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') , 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as ENDTIME
from t_model_overtimeReport where request_id = ( select max(request_id) from (select request_id from t_model_overtimeReport where end_status = 'T' group by request_id) )
reportTime >= '$reportStarttime$'
reportTime <= '$reportEndtime$'
custName like '%' || trim('$custName$') ||'%'
empname like '%' || trim('$empname$') ||'%'
taskName in ($taskName$)
order by REPORTTIME, PROCESS_NAME, CUSTNAME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME
select id, to_char(startDate, 'yyyyMMdd') as startDate, to_char(endDate, 'yyyyMMdd') as endDate from t_model_timeMain where delState = '0' order by startDate
select * from t_model_timeSide where mainID = '$id$' order by startTime
sqlMap.update: update t_model_overtimeReport t set t.end_status = 'T', t.HANDLE_TIME = sysdate where t.request_id = #request_id:DECIMAL:-9999#
sqlMap.select: select to_char(max(handle_time), 'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') as update_time from (select * from t_model_overtimeReport where request_id = (select max(request_id) from (select request_id from t_model_overtimeReport where end_status = 'T' group by request_id)))

SELECT DISTINCT ACTIVITY_NAME FROM t_process_task_exe_config t1 where DEFINITION_ID in ( SELECT DEFINITION_ID FROM T_PROCESS_CONFIG t2 where business_type='88' and t2.state='01' ) order by nlssort(ACTIVITY_NAME,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

select t5.execution_id as flow_id, t5.procdefid_ as definition_id, t6.process_name from (select t3.*, t4.procdefid_ from (select t2.* from (select t.*, row_number() over(partition by t.execution_id order by t.id desc) as rn from T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE t) t2 where t2.rn = 1 and t2.next_activity_name <> '结束') t3, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST t4 where t3.execution_id = t4.id_) t5, T_PROCESS_CONFIG t6 where t5.procdefid_ = t6.definition_id and t6.business_type = '88' order by t5.execution_id

select ID, REPORTTIME ,TASKNAME, CUSTNAME, ONECATEGORY_NAME,LOANCATEGORY_NAME, ORGNAME_ONE, ORGNAME_TWO, EMPNAME, trunc(OVERTIME, 2) as OVERTIME, REMARK, REQUEST_ID, PROCESS_NAME, to_char(to_date(STARTTIME, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') , 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as STARTTIME, to_char(to_date(ENDTIME, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') , 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as ENDTIME
from t_model_overtimeReportNotEnd where request_id = '$request_id$'
reportTime >= '$reportStarttime$'
reportTime <= '$reportEndtime$'
custName like '%' || trim('$custName$') ||'%'
empname like '%' || trim('$empname$') ||'%'
taskName in ($taskName$)
order by REPORTTIME, PROCESS_NAME, CUSTNAME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME
